decisions: Adopted Association Class pattern (Reification) for hypothesized relationships to handle metadata like p-values compliant with RDF standards.
Changed Cognitive_Resilience definition to use xsd:decimal for CDR scores to ensure precision matching.
Established strict disjoint separation between Proven (direct edges) and Hypothesized (reified nodes) logic layers.
action_items: Update ingestion scripts to map GWAS data to :HypothesisAssociation nodes (Data Engineer)
Run Fisher's Exact Test validation on the resilience subgraph (Validation Scientist)
summary_structured.key_context: The ontology schema has been finalized with a major architectural pivot to use reified Association Classes for probabilistic data, resolving a critical RDF compliance issue. The system is now ready for data ingestion, specifically requiring updates to ETL scripts to accommodate the new node-based logic layer.
